name: upgr0e
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 →(iEdg ` c0)= ∅)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls))

comment: The empty graph, with vertices but no edges, is a pseudograph. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 11-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 25-Nov-2020.)
